meanings.definition: to pave or cover in advance
meanings.sent1: She prepaves the path before the guests arrive.
meanings.sent2: The construction crew will prepaves the driveway tomorrow.
meanings.sent3: The ants prepaves their tunnels with tiny pebbles.
meanings.sent4: His kindness prepaves the way for future collaborations.
meanings.sent5: The gardener prepaves the garden with colorful stones.
